aka: My Daughter Rescued from the Swamp
trans_title: My Daughter Rescued from the Swamp
introduction: SYNOPSISYu-ri is forced into a gang of delinquent teenagers. She is soon influenced by her friends and their misconduct. Yu-ri rebels against her father's double life and her mother's ambivalence. She continuously refuses to go to school and runs away from home. On a trip, she loses her virginity to a boy she thinks she is in love with. As Yu-ri's personality turns tougher, her parents can no longer control her and they turn in their own daughter to the police. They receive instructions from Sergeant Yu who is in charge of juvenile delinquency. Yu-ri's parents follow his directions to look upon their child as an individual and with some distance. That way, they can learn to lean on each other. Through his instructions, Yu-ri and her parents are able to regain trust between them.故事一个被迫加入一群不好的年轻人的杯子开始和朋友们一起漂浮。在双重生活的蔑视，母亲的优柔寡断的态度，父亲玻璃一再否认学校，离家出走，并没有数量的失去贞操那个男孩从行程感受到了这种爱。不能应付父母粗暴的父母，不得不抱怨自己的孩子，从青年事务官员刘Ky那里接受任务。通过这个以距离和意志的方式培养对方孩子的任务，父母和父母之间的信心恢复了。
